2700 people will be in this room any minute. First of 10 loanDepot holiday parties.  Celebrating an incredible year. Thank you Devin Hernandez and team  #mmca #teamloandepot
Member of the senior management team, responsible for managing legal and compliance for the company's retail divisions.

Recruited to serve as key operations and management executive for a retail mortgage banker offering a comprehensive line of mortgage products, delivering in excess of $300 million dollars in annual loan volume.
CSK Auto (acquired by  O'Reilly Automotive, Inc.)

Served as real estate counsel for the largest specialty retailer of automotive parts and accessories in the Western United States.  Advised, assisted and coordinated senior management in legal efforts relating to store development (ranging from 2,600 to 24,000 square feet), including site selection, lease/purchase agreement drafting and negotiation, planning, design and construction.

Provided comprehensive legal and business solutions to clients at one of Arizona’s oldest law firms.    Represented clients in both real estate and lending practice groups, requiring familiarity with the law and the regulatory environment, attentiveness to detail, an appreciation of the client’s objectives and unique aspects of each transaction, timeliness of response and efficiency in delivery of service.

Loyola Consumer Law Review, Articles Editor

recommendations: Aaron W. Payne
Sales Manager at VIP Mortgage Inc
October 1, 2013, Aaron W. reported directly to Jackie

I have known Jackie for 4 years. During my tenure with Hunter Financial Group, Jackie has been a mentor, leader, sounding board, and example for doing things the right way. She is extremely knowledgeable, well spoken, and has the ability to look at things from all sides without bias or judgment. She is fearless when decisions need to be made, consistent in her method and emotions, and makes people want to be around her. My favorite quality of Jackie's is her ability to present the truth, her personal opinion, or bad news without hesitation, or emotion, and consistently follows up with solutions, and direction. She is fun to be around, fun to work with, and fun to know. Jackie would be a valuable asset to any company or project.

I worked directly with Kelly in her role as Senior Underwriter (DE) at Hunter Financial Group.    She is extremely well versed in agency and investor guidelines and adeptly applies them in analyzing each loan scenario.  With her tenure in the business, she has seen a wide variety of deals, allowing her to capitalize on her base of experience while underwriting loans.  She is highly efficient worker – able to complete a large pipeline without sacrificing quality.  She was consistently commended for assisting both operations and sales with pragmatic solutions to loan conditions – facilitating originations, while preserving compliance and quality.  She was a valuable asset to our organization.

summary: I help companies do things better, faster, simpler and compliant. At my core, I am a communicator and active listener with the ability to quickly analyze and assess a situation, the pros and cons, the potential risk, and diplomatically present my findings and implement changes.  For the last 12 years I have been successful in leading in a highly regulated and complex operational environment. I currently serve as SVP, Associate General Counsel at loanDepot- managing the retail legal and compliance department.  I specialize in mortgage banking compliance and have developed a special expertise in the area of distributed retail lending.  I am passionate about building teams and processes that contribute to the success of the company - linking strategy to structure.Prior to loanDepot, I served as General Counsel and EVP of Operations at Hunter Financial Group where I married my legal background with my operational strengths.  My professional experience also includes 4 years as an Attorney in Phoenix at the law firm of Ryley, Carlock and Applewhite in the real estate and finance group, and 2 years as counsel at CSK Auto in private practice in real estate development. Working for a law firm, a publicly traded corporation, and a small and large privately held businesses, I have gained a unique insight into the business needs of companies of all sizes.Specialties: Leadership & coaching, process creation and improvement, compliance, regulation and risk management, identifying and attracting talent, employee development/growth, strategic and analytic thinker, planning and strategies, workflow efficiencies, change management, transaction structuring
name: Jackie Mohr
title: SVP, Associate General Counsel at loanDepot
